projects.title: Portpholio
projects.label: Work In Progress / Incomplete
projects.description: Portpholio is a massive project using modern technologies such as OAuth, WYSIWYG Editor, and much more to allow for easy portfolio hosting. Due to college, I haven't had time to work on this as much as I would like to.

projects.title: Ahmadz.ai
projects.label: Blogs coming soon
projects.description: My portfolio website, built with simplicity and focus on clean UI in mind. I designed this with future upgrades in mind, login and backend system are setup to accommodate for the eventual blogs system.

projects.title: Splite
projects.description: Used by thousands of people daily, Splite is a highly intuitive bot aimed at providing fun and excitement while serving powerful moderation, role / emote management, and much more. This project helped me reinforce my knowledge of many core app-building features such as asynchronous API calls, optimization, and UX.

projects.title: Assemly Station - OOP345 Course Final Project
projects.description: The purpose of this term project was to put my C++ Object Oriented skills to practice by developing a simulation of an assembly line with any number of stations.

projects.title: WEB322 - Final Assignment
projects.description: A Simple Basic CRUD App using ExpressJS to serve handlebars views with data from MongoDB, PostgreSQL databases.

projects.title: Vacay
projects.description: An introductory full-stack, simple bnb-like web application for course WEB322 in Seneca.
